mapper.select: select (times-c) c from ( select round(frequency*2) times,(select count(*) from h_record where user_id=#{userId} and date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and is_pass ='0') c from h_area a left join h_building b on a.id =b.area_id left join h_hourse h on h.building_id =b.id left join h_family f on f.house_id=h.id where f.user_id=#{userId})x limit 1
select * from h_record where date_format(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and user_id=#{userId} and is_pass ='1' limit 1
